summary: Monday.com horizontal scaling (adapter pattern) and service-layer refactoring testing complete. All 15 backend API tests passed. Frontend verified: Home page loads with module status badges (Live Beta, Coming Soon), admin login works with admin@libreria.com/admin, admin dashboard loads successfully.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/monday/adapters/pinpanclub/config returns config with players_board_id, matches_board_id, auto_sync flags (admin auth)
Backend: PUT /api/monday/adapters/pinpanclub/config saves config successfully (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/monday/adapters/pinpanclub/config requires admin auth (401 without)
Backend: GET /api/monday/adapters/memberships/config returns config with board_id, column_mapping, enabled flag (admin auth)
Backend: PUT /api/monday/adapters/memberships/config saves config successfully (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/monday/adapters/memberships/config requires admin auth (401 without)
Backend: GET /api/admin/module-status returns statuses via service layer (admin auth)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/module-status saves via service layer (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/public/module-status returns public statuses (no auth)
Backend: GET /api/admin/ui-style returns style via service layer (admin auth)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/ui-style saves via service layer (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style returns public UI style (no auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/dashboard returns inventory stats (admin auth)
Backend: GET /api/store/inventory/dashboard requires admin auth (401 without)
Backend: POST /api/auth-v2/login admin login works with admin@libreria.com/admin
Frontend: Home page at / loads correctly with module status badges (Live Beta, Coming Soon)
Frontend: Admin login at /admin/login works with admin@libreria.com/admin
Frontend: Admin dashboard loads after login with Products, Orders, Users, Notifications stats
critical_code_review_comments: PinPanClub adapter (monday_adapter.py) correctly extends BaseMondayAdapter with backward-compatible event listeners for auto_sync_matches and auto_sync_players
Memberships adapter (monday_memberships_adapter.py) is an admin-configurable skeleton with column_mapping dict for flexible board configuration
Service layer refactoring (module_status_service.py, ui_style_service.py) properly extracts business logic from routes.py into dedicated service classes
Minor: Console warning about React setState in render cycle in AdminLogin component - non-blocking
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data. PinPanClub and Memberships adapter configs default to empty/disabled since no Monday.com boards configured.

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are real. Monday.com adapters are configured to work with actual Monday.com boards when board IDs are set.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Monday.com adapter pattern implemented. PinPanClub adapter config: GET/PUT /api/monday/adapters/pinpanclub/config with players_board_id, matches_board_id, tournaments_board_id, auto_sync_players, auto_sync_matches, auto_sync_results. Memberships adapter config: GET/PUT /api/monday/adapters/memberships/config with board_id, subscriptions_board_id, column_mapping dict, auto_sync_plans, auto_sync_subscriptions, enabled. Service layer refactoring: module_status_service.py and ui_style_service.py extract business logic from admin/routes.py. Public endpoints /api/public/module-status and /api/public/ui-style use service layer. Dashboard service at /api/admin/dashboard/stats. All adapters require admin auth.
